titleStmt.title: The holy practises of a devine lover, or, The sainctly [sic] Ideots Deuotions the contents of the booke are contained in the ensuinge page.
titleStmt.author: More, Gertrude, 1606-1633.
Baker, Augustine, 1575-1641.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gertrude More. Cf. BLC.
